features: YOUR GOAL: Brighten and Re-energize Your Hair

OUR SOLUTION: Antioxidant shampoo for super stressed hair. Adaptogenic herbs and mushrooms like ashwagandha, holy basil, reishi mushroom, and turmeric combine with supergreens spinach, kale and spirulina to brighten and re-energize your hair.
PERFOMANCE DRIVEN HAIR CARE: Energizing shampoo for stressed hair
100% VEGAN: Vegan and certified cruelty-free. Also Paraben free, Sulfate free, Mineral oil free, Petrolatum free and Formaldehyde free
DIRECTION: Apply to wet hair. Massage into scalp and hair, working through the ends. Rinse thoroughly. Caution: I can't believe we have to say this but please don't drink.
body.description: OUR STORY: We are skin & hair wellness enthusiasts who believe in the power of purity to uplift the way you feel. We want to see every action you take lead to a stronger, healthier, more vibrant you that is ready to kick ass and take names. INGREDIENTS: We source the highest quality ingredients for your skin. No parabens, sulfates, formaldehyde, paraffin, mineral oil or animal testing allowed! SUPER POSITIVE EFFECT: Our products always uplift, for skin & hair that performs at its absolute best and a planet that flourishes. THOUGHTFUL INGENUITY: We mix together the perfect combination of super nutrients for powerful products. SHEER PASSION: We are on a mission to steer people toward better for you and accessible skin care & hair care that will allow them to shine their brightest. OUR MISSION is to take skin & hair from blah to brilliant by boosting their performance with powerful combination of amazing ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this! My hair feels super clean, thicker, soft, and the smell is amazing. I love that it doesn’t have any toxic chemicals too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall I love this shampoo. It has a nice smell that isn’t too overpowering, lathers nicely and has good ingredients. My main issue is that the viscosity between batches does not seem consistent. Our first bottle was too runny and difficult to use because it seemed watered down. The second bottle was perfect

reviews.reviewerName: Its sleek design and sturdy! The soft interior lining prevents scratches, and the compact size is perfect for on-the-go. Overall, a stylish and functional accessory for anyone looking to keep their sunglasses safe in style!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not as gel-like as a typical shampoo should be. Very watery. I have ordered in the past and this was not the normal product. Quality control is way down. I do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Made my hair very greasy!!! Will not order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair that shines
reviews.reviewText: I love the shine in my hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent biofilm cleanse
reviews.reviewText: While ridding my body of multiple infections of many kinds, I've tried probably hundreds of soaps and shampoos. This ranks in the top 10.
